properties.entry: SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD C JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO TBL_FREE_BOARD A ( A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_FREE_POST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )

UPDATE /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#incrementBoardCount() */ TBL_FREE_BOARD A SET A.VIEW_NO = (SELECT B.VIEW_NO FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD B WHERE POST_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.POST_NO = ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.NoticeDATO#selectNoticeDetail() */ A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_FREE_BOARD A SET A.POST_TITLE = ? , A.POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
UPDATE TBL_FREE_BOARD A SET A.VIEW_YN = 'N' WHERE A.POST_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD A JOIN TBL_USER B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD A WHERE A.VIEW_YN = 'Y' AND A.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD C JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD C JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.POST_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.sabang.findMyRoom.freeBoard.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.POST_NO , A.POST_TITLE , A.POST_CONTENT , A.USER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.VIEW_NO , A.CREATION_DATE , A.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.POST_NO , B.POST_TITLE , B.POST_CONTENT , B.USER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.VIEW_NO , B.CREATION_DATE , B.VIEW_YN FROM (SELECT C.POST_NO , C.POST_TITLE , C.POST_CONTENT , C.USER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.VIEW_NO , C.CREATION_DATE , C.VIEW_YN FROM TBL_FREE_BOARD C JOIN TBL_USER E ON(C.USER_NO = E.USER_NO) WHERE C.VIEW_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY C.POST_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.POST_CONTENT LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
